modes.name: View in a lightbox
modes.description: When triggered, this MiniReel will open a lightbox on top of the web page.

modes.name: Lightbox, without Companion Ad
modes.description: Simple video and text MiniReel. No character limits, the content space will scroll as needed.

modes.name: Lightbox, with Companion Ad
modes.description: A 300x250 ad will be displayed on every slide. No character limits, the content space will scroll as needed.

modes.name: View within the web page
modes.description: When triggered, this MiniReel will display itself in the allotted content space of your website.

modes.name: Embedded, Light Text
modes.description: Recommended for content that is light on text. Copy is limited to approximately 200 characters.

modes.name: Embedded, Heavy Text
modes.description: Provides more room for editorial content. Copy is limited to approximately 420 characters.
